table.title: Installed, required and recommended apps. Click on a row to open the link to the addon or use the manage apps page.

search.query: | inputlookup app_dependencies | rename app_name AS title | join type=outer title [ | rest /services/apps/local | table title, label | stats values(label) AS label count by title] | eval is_installed = if(isnull(count),"false","true") | table label, title, is_required, is_installed, splunkbase_url
